medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Menarche at age 13, with heavy periods occurring at 2- to 7-month intervals. An evaluation 9 months prior revealed polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) as the etiology. Last menstrual period was 1 month ago, elicited by medroxyprogesterone acetate (MPA).
medical_history.past_medical_history: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS); history of migraine headaches with aura.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has a history of deep venous thrombosis during pregnancy; maternal grandmother has osteoporosis with a hip fracture at age 65.
medical_history.social_history: Sexually active; uses condoms 80% of the time.
